item.title: TAMUctf 2020 - Russian Nesting Doll
item.description: 1. Introduction This is my second writeup for this year’s TAMUctf challenges. It’s about the “RUSSIAN_NESTING_DOLL” challenge that came under the “MISC” category. We will be analyzing some suspicious network traffic in order to extract the information that was exfiltrated. Category Name Solves Points Misc Russian Nesting Doll +65 ~444 2. Challenge description Our monitoring systems noticed some funny-looking DNS traffic on one of our computers.
